title: 'The bottles kept coming': How talk of a Kim-Trump summit began
text:
'The bottles kept coming': How talk of a Kim-Trump summit began Friday, March 09, 2018 - 01:36 
Kim Jong Un is said to have made jokes about himself and served a flood of liquor and noodles during the meeting with South Korean officials that sparked talk of a meeting with   Trump.   
Kim Jong Un is said to have made jokes about himself and served a flood of liquor and noodles during the meeting with South Korean officials that sparked talk of a meeting with   Trump.  //reut.rs/2IeBXbR
